adware_text.message: Block malicious programs from injecting ads into your browser, hijacking your clicks or homepage, and tracking your activity

allow_fair_ads_description.message: Choosing to allow a few ads helps support the participating websites that rely on revenue from advertising and supports a free and fair web.

appDesc.message: AdBlock Stands: Ad Blocker for YouTube, Video Ads, Facebook, Website, Popup and More. Protect Your Browsing Experience for Free!

available_on_text.message: Download $stands_browser$ and enjoy ad-free web surfing on $android$. You can also install the extension on other browsers.

blocking_statistics_text.message: Here you have historical data about how many ads were blocked over a certain period.

board_text_1.message: The Stands team is grateful to you for installing the extension. To make your experience with the product as comfortable as possible, please review the

bouquet.message: It’s like a bouquet and a box of chocolate

cup_of_coffee.message: It's like a cup of coffee

custom_amount_text.message: It’s up to you to choose the price

donation_card_text.message: To keep $stands$ free and enhance its quality, we ask for your support.

donation_notification_text.message: Help us to keep $stands$ free and enhance its quality

donation_screen_text.message: In order to maintain free access for absolutely all Stands Fair users, while constantly improving the product, we ask for your support. Absolutely all money will go towards improving the product.

donation_settings_text.message: Stands is and will be a free product. Donations are solely for charitable purposes and have no effect on the functionality or performance of individual devices. If you want to support our team and make sure the extension can only get better and appear on new platforms, choose the amount you would like to donate.

facebook_ads_text.message: Ads that appear in your news feed and next to it. Not blocked by default because that's how Facebook funds the free service it provides

fairness_settings_text.message: Max ads allowed on a page

feedback_screen_text.message: We would like to hear your thoughts, suggestions, concerns or problems with anything so we can improve!

include_current_url.message: Include current URL in the report

no_blocked_on_this_page.message: There were no blocked elements on this page

onboarding_donation_text.message: $stands$ is and will be a free product. You can donate any amount to make sure the extension gets better and appears on more platforms.

other_blocks.message: Your other ad blocker still blocks ads

other_disabled.message: Perfect, other ad blockers were successfully disabled!

other_prevents.message: Your other ad blocker prevents the bypass

popup_allowed_add_sites.message: Add sites with allowed popups using the form below.

popups_text.message: By default popups are blocked on all sites, you can allow popups on specific sites

rate_fairadblocker.message: Rate AdBlocker Stands to help us grow and raise more

refresh_take_effect.message: Refresh the page for this change to take effect

report_issue_text.message: We are sorry to hear that something isn’t right. Please tell us about it and we’ll fix it.

search_ads_text.message: Ads that appear next to your search results. Not blocked by default because that's how Google, Microsoft and others fund the free service they provide

sponsored_text.message: Many sites show article recommendations relevant to the one you are reading, some of them are sponsored and can be considered ads

stands_is_paused.message: STANDS is paused on all sites

stands_turned_off_would_turn.message: STANDS is turned off, would you like to turn it on?

sushi.message: It’s like a sushi dinner for one

themes_badge_page.message: Show the number of blocked items on current page

themes_badge_today.message: Show today's number of blocked items

this_site_shows.message: This site blocks or shows a message to ad-blocking users

tracking_text.message: Protect your privacy from thousands of web tracking scripts and third parties

undo_my_blocked_on_this_page.message: Undo my blocked elements on this page

web_mail_text.message: Text ads that appear at the top of your mail list. Not blocked by default because that's how Google, Yahoo and others fund the free service they provide

whitelisted_text.message: Here you can manage your whitelist. When a site is whitelisted, Stands is completely disabled on that site, no blocking of any kind and no placement of ads that sponsor your cause.

winebottle.message: It’s like a bottle of good wine

would_bypass.message: Would you like to bypass it or whitelist this site?

would_disable_other.message: Would you like to disable your other ad blocker?

would_rate.message: Would you like to rate us?

would_stop.message: Would you like it to stop or continue?

you_blocked_ads_popups_and_saved.message: You blocked $ads$ ads, $popups$ popups, and saved $saved$
